message.content:
Monday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal with sliced banana, chia seeds, and unsweetened coconut flakes. Serve with almond milk alternative (such as soy or rice milk).
Snack: Fresh berries with a handful of pumpkin seeds.
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes, steamed broccoli, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing.
Snack: Carrots and celery sticks with hummus.
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and sautéed spinach.
Tuesday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, unsweetened coconut milk, spinach, and protein powder (soy or pea-based).
Snack: Rice cakes with avocado spread and sliced cucumber.
Lunch: Grilled tofu with roasted Brussels sprouts, brown rice, and a soy sauce-based dressing.
Snack: Sliced bell pepper strips with guacamole.
Dinner: Turkey meatballs with zucchini noodles in tomato sauce.
Wednesday:
Breakfast: Breakfast burrito made with scrambled eggs, black beans, salsa, and gluten-free tortilla.
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.
Lunch: Grilled portobello mushrooms with quinoa and roasted asparagus.
Snack: Rice crackers with sliced cucumber and hummus.
Dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted sweet potatoes, green beans, and a lemon-tahini sauce.
Thursday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free pancakes made with almond flour (using coconut milk or rice milk), served with fresh fruit and maple syrup.
Snack: Rice cakes with sliced avocado and pumpkin seeds.
Lunch: Grilled shrimp skewers with roasted Brussels sprouts, brown rice, and a soy sauce-based dressing.
Snack: Sliced bell pepper strips with guacamole.
Dinner: Turkey chili made with ground turkey, tomatoes, kidney beans, and served over quinoa.
Friday:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with frozen mixed berries, unsweetened coconut milk, spinach, and protein powder (soy or pea-based).
Snack: Rice crackers with sliced cucumber and hummus.
Lunch: Grilled tofu with roasted Brussels sprouts, brown rice, and a soy sauce-based dressing.
Snack: Sliced bell pepper strips with guacamole.
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and sautéed spinach.
Saturday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal with sliced banana, chia seeds, and unsweetened coconut flakes. Serve with almond milk alternative (such as soy or rice milk).
Snack: Fresh berries with a handful of pumpkin seeds.
Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes, steamed broccoli, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing.
Snack: Carrots and celery sticks with hummus.
Dinner: Turkey meatballs with zucchini noodles in tomato sauce.
Sunday:
Breakfast: Breakfast burrito made with scrambled eggs, black beans, salsa, and gluten-free tortilla.
Snack: Apple slices with sunflower seed butter.
Lunch: Grilled portobello mushrooms with quinoa and roasted asparagus.
Snack: Rice crackers with sliced cucumber and hummus.
Dinner: Baked chicken thighs with roasted sweet potatoes, green beans, and a lemon-tahini sauce.
